case.title: Change - 32 (London)
case.text:
Hi Guys, I will be travelling to london in Aug for a week and looking to meet somone while in london am currently single with a very good job but it is time to also do something for me. Was thinking we start as friends and see how it goes if we get serious i can relocate and still work in london
PS am black woman 32, very attractive will let you be the judge of that , independed not looking for any finacial support or someone to help me move to london am based in Europe, reply if interested with your pic. Please only if you are serious
thanks for taking the time read :)
